Headline: Spring Savings Event
Body: Refresh your wardrobe with up to 40% off selected items this week only.
CTA: Shop the sale now

Headline: Weekend Flash Deal
Body: Save on top picks before Sunday midnight. Limited stock available.

Headline: Welcome to CampaignPilot
Body: Get started by creating your first automated campaign in under five minutes.
CTA: Launch your first campaign
